definitions.definition: A young Atlantic salmon, Salmo salar, before it becomes a smolt; a parr.
Any of various flowers in the genus Dianthus, sometimes called carnations.
definitions.example: This garden in particular has a beautiful bed of pinks.

definitions.definition: A perfect example; excellence, perfection; the embodiment of some quality.
definitions.example: Your hat, madam, is the very pink of fashion.

definitions.definition: The colour of this flower, between red and white; pale red.
definitions.example: My new dress is a wonderful shade of pink.

definitions.definition: Hunting pink; scarlet, as worn by hunters.
One of the colour balls used in snooker, with a value of 6 points.
definitions.example: Oh dear, he's left himself snookered behind the pink.

definitions.definition: An unlettered and uncultured, but relatively prosperous, member of the middle classes; compare Babbitt, bourgeoisie.
A socialist who is not wholly communist.
Flowers in the family Caryophyllaceae, sometimes called carnations.
The traditional scarlet jacket(s) worn by fox-hunters in the United Kingdom.
